module.name: Asterisk Manager Users
module.changelog: *2.11.0.5* Added manager setting of message *2.11.0.4* Add license file *2.11.0.3* Move module to standard repository *2.11.0.2* #6088, don't allow duplicate FreePBX managers and rename *2.11.0.1* #6429 *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.2* #5565 properly generate manager_additional.conf with manager_conf class *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.3* #5097 *2.9.0.2* spelling, localizations *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions, set repository *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
